  • Method Details

    • averageCalories

      public static int averageCalories(ArrayList<Food> foods)
      Determines the average calories in a list of foods. No rounding necessary. Foods list parameter may be empty.
      Parameters:
      foods - a list of Food
      Returns:
      average calories in all Food objects

    • averageCaloriesByOrigin

      public static int averageCaloriesByOrigin(ArrayList<Food> foods, int origin)
      Determines the average calories in a list of foods for a particular origin. No rounding necessary. Foods list parameter may be empty.
      Parameters:
      foods - a list of Food
      origin - the origin of the Food
      Returns:
      average calories for all Foods of the specified origin

    • getByOrigin

      public static ArrayList<Food> getByOrigin(ArrayList<Food> foods, int origin)
      Creates a list of foods by origin.
      Parameters:
      foods - a list of Food
      origin - a food origin
      Returns:
      a list of Food from origin

    • getFood

      public static Food getFood(Scanner keyboard)
      Creates a Food object by requesting data from a user. Uses the format: 
          Name: name
    Origins
     0 Canadian
     1 Chinese
    ...
    11 English
    Origin: origin number
    Vegetarian (Y/N): Y/N
    Calories: calories
      Parameters:
      keyboard - a keyboard Scanner
      Returns:
      a Food object

    • getVegetarian

      public static ArrayList<Food> getVegetarian(ArrayList<Food> foods)
      Creates a list of vegetarian foods.
      Parameters:
      foods - a list of Food
      Returns:
      a list of vegetarian Food

    • readFood

      public static Food readFood(String line)
      Creates and returns a Food object from a line of string data.
      Parameters:
      line - a vertical bar-delimited line of food data in the format name|origin|isVegetarian|calories
      Returns:
      the data from line as a Food object

    • readFoods

      public static ArrayList<Food> readFoods(Scanner fileIn)
      Reads a file of food strings into a list of Food objects.
      Parameters:
      fileIn - a Scanner of a Food data file in the format name|origin|isVegetarian|calories
      Returns:
      a list of Food

    • foodSearch

      public static ArrayList<Food> foodSearch(ArrayList<Food> foods, int origin, int maxCalories, boolean isVegetarian)
      Searches for foods that fit certain conditions.
      Parameters:
      foods - a list of Food
      origin - the origin of the food; if -1, accept any origin
      maxCalories - the maximum calories for the food; if 0, accept any
      isVegetarian - whether the food is vegetarian or not; if false accept any
      Returns:
      a list of foods that fit the conditions specified

    • writeFoods

      public static void writeFoods(ArrayList<Food> foods, PrintStream ps)
      Writes the contents of a list of Food to a PrintStream.
      Parameters:
      foods - a list of Food
      ps - the PrintStream to write to
